item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂利润率短期缓解
item.description: 中国的铜冶炼厂在短期内从较高的费用中解脱出来，尽管利润率的提高可能不足以吸引它们提高产量。【原文：Chinese copper smelters are getting short-term relief from higher fees, although the improvement in profitability may not be enough to entice them into lifting production.】

item.title: 英国面包连锁店 Greggs 增长乏力，空头大举入场
item.description: 由于这家英国连锁面包店难以让投资者相信开设更多门店会提振乏力的销售业绩，卖空者对 Greggs Plc 的押注达到了自全球金融危机以来从未有过的水平。【原文：Short sellers are betting against Greggs Plc at levels not seen since the global financial crisis, as the UK bakery chain struggles to convince investors that opening more shops will boost lackluster sales.】

item.title: 投资者聚焦土耳其通胀报告，寻找利率走向线索
item.description: 土耳其央行将于本周四公布其年底通胀预测，任何上调的幅度都将影响人们对利率走向的预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank will announce its year-end inflation forecast on Thursday, with the magnitude of any upward revision set to shape expectations for the course of interest rates.】

item.title: 中国和印度就暂停五年后恢复边境贸易进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的新德里官员称，印度和中国正在讨论恢复时隔五年多的本地制造商品的边境贸易，这是亚洲邻国为缓和长期紧张关系所做的缓慢但稳步努力中的最新一步。【原文：India and China are discussing resuming border trade of locally made goods after more than five years, marking the latest step in a slow but steady effort by the Asian neighbors to ease long-standing tensions, according to officials in New Delhi familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 森那美寻求贷款为谷歌建设马来西亚数据中心
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马来西亚开发商森那美地产公司（Sime Darby Property）正在与银行洽谈贷款事宜，贷款额度高达 30 亿林吉特（约合 7.14 亿美元），用于资助建设一个数据中心，该数据中心将租给谷歌。【原文：Malaysian developer Sime Darby Property is in talks with banks for a loan of as much as 3 billion ringgit ($714 million) to fund the building of a data center that will be leased to Google, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔下令对前部长之子遭注射器袭击事件进行 "透明 "调查
item.description: 马来西亚前部长拉菲兹-拉姆利（Rafizi Ramli）称，他的儿子周三下午在一家商场停车场遭到注射器袭击，马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）呼吁进行 "透明而迅速的调查"。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has called for a “transparent and swift investigation” after former minister Rafizi Ramli said his son had been attacked with a syringe at a mall parking lot on Wednesday afternoon.】

item.title: 中国业务开始复苏，Jollibee 销售额创历史新高
item.description: 菲律宾顶级餐饮运营商 Jollibee Foods Corp. 表示，随着中国业务的复苏，第二季度销售额跃升至历史新高，有望实现扭亏为盈。【原文：Top Philippine restaurant operator Jollibee Foods Corp. said sales jumped to a record high in the second quarter as its China business recovered and looks set for a turnaround.】

item.title: 印度炼油厂纳亚拉诉诸海上转移燃料出口
item.description: 纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）在受到欧盟制裁打击后装运的首批货物之一已被转移到另一艘海上油轮上，这证明这家印度炼油商正在努力继续出口燃料。【原文：One of the first cargoes shipped by Nayara Energy Ltd. after it was hit by EU sanctions has been transferred to another tanker at sea, evidence the Indian refiner is trying to keep exporting fuel.】

item.title: 印度投资者在美俄峰会前表现出谨慎乐观情绪
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 贝森特建议缩小利率差距后，日元表现优于同行
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）发表建议美联储和日本央行调整政策利率的言论后，日元在周四上午的表现优于所有主要同类货币。【原文：The yen outperformed all of its major peers on Thursday morning after US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent made comments suggesting the Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan adjust their policy rates.】

item.title: 印尼股市收盘创新高，外资大举进场
item.description: 随着外国投资者重新开始购买印尼股票，印尼基准股票指数有望创下历史新高。【原文：Indonesia’s benchmark stock index was poised to close at an all-time high as foreign investors returned to buying the nation’s equities.】

item.title: 可可和咖啡销售激增，Olam 公司股价上涨，利润增加
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的农产品贸易商奥兰集团有限公司（Olam Group Ltd.）公布上半年利润大增后，股价创下自 4 月份以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of Singapore-based agricultural trader Olam Group Ltd. rose by the most since April after it reported a surge in first-half profit.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率下降，支持澳大利亚央行维持利率不变
item.description: 澳大利亚失业率下降，就业率上升，这表明劳动力市场依然紧张，并强化了储备银行对宽松政策的谨慎态度。【原文：Australia’ jobless rate ticked lower and employment rose, signaling the labor market remains tight and reinforcing the Reserve Bank’s cautious approach to policy easing.】

item.title: 长江和记投资者关注盈利前港口出售的最新进展
item.description: 长江和记实业控股有限公司股价的下一步涨势将在很大程度上取决于该企业集团就其政治敏感的全球港口资产出售可能提供的任何最新情况。【原文：The next leg of CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.’s stock rally will depend in large part on any update the conglomerate may provide on its politically sensitive global port asset sale.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金美世因披露客户信息遭起诉
印度准财富基金寻求将资产翻番至 100 亿美元
item.description: 在全球增长最快的主要经济体对城市基础设施需求激增的推动下，印度 49 亿美元的准主权财富基金正努力在未来 30 个月内将其管理资产翻一番，达到 100 亿美元。【原文：India’s $4.9 billion quasi-sovereign wealth fund is seeking to double its assets under management to $10 billion within the next 30 months, fueled by surging demand for urban infrastructure in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 特朗普征收 50%关税威胁印度制造业雄心
item.description: 印度最大的制鞋商法利达集团已经在泰米尔纳德邦南部的一块 150 英亩的土地上建造了一个庞大的新出口工厂。随后，来自华盛顿的打击接踵而至：唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布将印度出口产品的关税提高一倍，达到 50%。【原文：India’s largest shoemaker Farida Group had already staked out the land — a 150-acre plot in southern Tamil Nadu — for a sprawling new export plant. Then came a blow from Washington: President Donald Trump announced he was doubling tariffs on Indian exports to 50%.】

item.title: 贝森特敦促美国央行降息后黄金上涨
item.description: 在财政部长斯科特-贝森特敦促美国央行降低借贷成本后，市场对美联储降息的押注增加，黄金连续第三天上涨。【原文：Gold rose for a third day as bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts increased after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent urged the US central bank to lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 丰业银行裁减美国和亚太地区的投资银行家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）在美国和亚太地区的投资银行部门进行了一系列裁员。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia has carried out a series of layoffs in its US and Asia Pacific investment-banking divisions, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市牛气冲天，成交额突破 2 万亿元人民币
item.description: 交易活动的高涨唤起了中国股市的动物精神，交易员们都在为进一步上涨做准备。【原文：Elevated trading activity is rousing animal spirits in China’s stock market, as traders position for further gains.】

item.title: 日本天然气厂大火引发芯片供应链中断担忧
item.description: 日本工业气体制造商关东电气工业株式会社（Kanto Denka Kogyo Co.【原文：A fire at Japanese industrial gas maker Kanto Denka Kogyo Co.’s factory is spurring concerns about possible disruptions to the semiconductor supply chain.】

item.title: 贝森特称日本央行正落后于曲线，预计将加息
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，日本央行在应对通胀方面落后于形势，他罕见地对外国央行的政策决定提出了警告。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Bank of Japan is falling behind the curve in addressing inflation, in a rare comment admonishing policy decisions by a foreign central bank.】

item.title: 波杜尔掠过香港，香港扩大降雨警告范围，降雨量创历史新高
item.description: 热带风暴 "波杜 "经过香港时，香港的中央商务区和外围机场受到狂风和暴雨的袭击，香港再次发出最高降雨量警告。【原文：Hong Kong’s central business district and outer airport were hit by violent gusts and a deluge of heavy rainfall, with the city again issuing its highest rain warning as Tropical Storm Podul passed the region.】

item.title: 白宫解雇波多黎各监督委员会另一名成员
item.description: 白宫解雇了监督波多黎各财政的监察委员会的另一名成员。【原文：The White House has fired another member of the watchdog board that oversees Puerto Rico’s finances.】

item.title: 凭借个人电脑增长和人工智能需求，联想集团利润超出预期
item.description: 联想集团（Lenovo Group Ltd.）公布的利润好于预期，因为公司加快了个人电脑采购，以应对美国可能征收的新关税。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. reported better-than-expected profit after companies accelerated PC purchases to get ahead of potential new US tariffs.】

item.title: 交易员指南：普拉博沃总统的首份印尼预算案
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）将于周五向国会提交 2026 年预算，市场将关注他打算如何在维持财政纪律的同时推进其民粹主义议程。【原文：As Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto presents his 2026 budget to parliament Friday, the market will be watching how he intends to promote his populist agenda while maintaining fiscal discipline.】

item.title: 尽管新加坡债券相对美国债券价格上涨，但仍吸引了大量买家
item.description: 由于投资者在寻求美国资产以外的避险选择，新加坡政府的对冲债券与美国同类债券相比是至少四年来最昂贵的。【原文：Hedged Singapore government bonds are the most expensive versus US peers in at least four years as investors seek safe-haven alternatives to American assets.】

item.title: South32 对非洲铝冶炼厂减值 3.72 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司 South32 Ltd. 将对其在莫桑比克的铝项目计提 3.72 亿美元的减值，该公司称，由于未能获得负担得起的能源供应，该项目可能于明年关闭。【原文：Australian miner South32 Ltd. will take a $372 million impairment on its aluminum project in Mozambique that it said could shut next year, after it failed to secure an affordable energy supply.】
